content: Who wrote the play 'Death of a Salesman', which won the Pulitzer Prize for Drama in 1949?

I'm here to help with that! The play "Death of a Salesman" was written by Arthur Miller. It's a powerful drama that delves into the life of Willy Loman, a traveling salesman who is struggling with his career and personal relationships. The play won the Pulitzer Prize for Drama in 1949 and is considered one of the greatest works in American theater. If you have any more questions about this or any other topic, feel free to ask!
